page.title: 02Park Road C.P. School 1985
page.content: The school was opened in 1939 and there are 184 children on roll.There are seven classrooms but only six are in use.The school has a playground and a field which are both used.There is also a canteen and hall.There are seven teachers including the headmaster.In the canteen there are three cooks and two dinner ladies.The school also has cleaning ladies,a caretaker and a secretary.The most important subjects are English and Maths.We also study History,Geography, Science,Art,Religious Education,Music and physical activities.In the school we have audio-visual aids such as a television,radios,tape recorders a video and a computer.
